_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Support for Tuya Zigbee devices with local control (no cloud required). Community-maintained fork with SDK3 compliance, supporting 163 device types including lights, sensors, switches, climate controls, and more. Based on Johan Bendz's original work with active development and monthly updates.
description.fr: Support pour appareils Tuya Zigbee avec contrôle local (sans cloud). Fork maintenu par la communauté avec conformité SDK3, supportant 163 types d'appareils incluant lumières, capteurs, interrupteurs, contrôles climatiques, et plus. Basé sur le travail original de Johan Bendz avec développement actif et mises à jour mensuelles.

hint.en: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting device issues
Receive notifications about new device support from community

instruction.en: Press and hold setup button for 3 seconds
Follow the pairing instructions for your Door Lock.
Follow the pairing instructions for your Doorbell.

Press and hold the pairing button for 5 seconds until LED blinks rapidly.

Press and hold the pairing button for 5 seconds until LED blinks rapidly.

Press and hold the pairing button until the LED blinks
Press any button to pair

Turn the switch on/off 3 times quickly

Follow the pairing instructions for your Smart Water Valve.

name.en: Advanced Smoke Detector with Temperature & Humidity

Follow the pairing instructions for your Temperature Sensor.
